mapper.sql: plan_id, position_id, equipment_name, equipment_num, item_position, item_effect,effect_code, equipment_big_type, equipment_middle_type, equipment_small_type, equipment_specification, equipment_param_name, equipment_param_value, item_remarks,big_type_code,middle_type_code,small_type_code,specification_code,status

item_id, plan_id, position_id, equipment_name, equipment_num, item_position, item_effect,effect_code, equipment_big_type, equipment_middle_type, equipment_small_type, equipment_specification, equipment_param_name, equipment_param_value, item_remarks,big_type_code,middle_type_code,small_type_code,specification_code,status
mapper.insert:
insert into el_plan_item
item_id,
plan_id,
position_id,
equipment_name,
equipment_num,
item_position,
item_effect,
effect_code,
equipment_big_type,
equipment_middle_type,
equipment_small_type,
equipment_specification,
equipment_param_name,
equipment_param_value,
item_remarks,
big_type_code,
middle_type_code,
small_type_code,
specification_code,
status,
#{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{itemPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{effectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentBigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentMiddleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentSmallType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentParamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{equipmentParamValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bigTypeCode},
#{middleTypeCode},
#{smallTypeCode},
#{specificationCode},
#{status},
mapper.select: SELECT e1.item_id as item_id, e1.plan_id as plan_id, e1.position_id as position_id, e1.equipment_name as equipment_name, e1.equipment_num as equipment_num, e2.name as item_position, e7.name as item_effect, e1.effect_code as effect_code, e3.name as equipment_big_type, e4.name as equipment_middle_type, e5.name as equipment_small_type, e6.name as equipment_specification, e1.equipment_param_name as equipment_param_name, e1.equipment_param_value as equipment_param_value, e1.item_remarks as item_remarks, e1.big_type_code as big_type_code, e1.middle_type_code as middle_type_code, e1.small_type_code as small_type_code, e1.specification_code as specification_code, e1.status as status FROM el_plan_item e1 left join el_organization e2 on e1.position_id = e2.code and e2.status='1' left join sb_type e3 on e1.big_type_code = e3.code and e3.status='1' left join sb_type e4 on e1.middle_type_code = e4.code and e4.status='1' left join sb_type e5 on e1.small_type_code = e5.code and e5.status='1' left join sb_model e6 on e1.specification_code = e6.code and e6.status='1' left join sb_position e7 on e1.effect_code = e7.code and e7.status='1' WHERE e1.plan_id = #{planId} and e1.status = '1'

SELECT e1.item_id as item_id, e1.plan_id as plan_id, e1.position_id as position_id, e1.equipment_name as equipment_name, e1.equipment_num as equipment_num, e2.name as item_position, e7.name as item_effect, e1.effect_code as effect_code, e3.name as equipment_big_type, e4.name as equipment_middle_type, e5.name as equipment_small_type, e6.name as equipment_specification, e1.equipment_param_name as equipment_param_name, e1.equipment_param_value as equipment_param_value, e1.item_remarks as item_remarks, e1.big_type_code as big_type_code, e1.middle_type_code as middle_type_code, e1.small_type_code as small_type_code, e1.specification_code as specification_code FROM el_plan_item e1 left join el_organization e2 on e1.position_id = e2.code and e2.status='1' left join sb_type e3 on e1.big_type_code = e3.code and e3.status='1' left join sb_type e4 on e1.middle_type_code = e4.code and e4.status='1' left join sb_type e5 on e1.small_type_code = e5.code and e5.status='1' left join sb_model e6 on e1.specification_code = e6.code and e6.status='1' left join sb_position e7 on e1.effect_code = e7.code and e7.status='1' WHERE e1.item_id = #{itemId} and e1.status = '1'
mapper.update:
update el_plan_item
plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
equipment_name = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_num = #{equipmentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_position = #{itemPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_effect = #{itemEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_big_type = #{equipmentBigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_middle_type = #{equipmentMiddleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_small_type = #{equipmentSmallType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_specification = #{equipmentSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_param_name = #{equipmentParamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_param_value = #{equipmentParamValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_remarks = #{itemRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
big_type_code = #{bigTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
middle_type_code = #{middleTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
small_type_code = #{smallTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specification_code = #{specificationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effect_code = #{effectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update el_plan_item set status = '99' where item_id = #{itemId}
